org.csstudio.platform.security
Class Credentials

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.security.Credentials

public final class Credentials
extends java.lang.Object

Objects of this class are used to pass a user's username and password from an ILoginCallbackHandler to a ILoginModule. References to Credentials objects should be discarded as early as possible to prevent passwords from being kept in memory unnecessarily.

Author:
Anze Vodovnik, Jörg Rathlev
